name: Beast Park
description:
This is a bullet screen shooting role-playing game, where players can freely match their decks and have a thrilling battle!

Gameplay Introduction:

Easy to learn, dodge monster attacks by moving, and roll for a moment to dodge damage.

Each character has a skill that accumulates energy by killing monsters. When the energy is full, it can unleash a powerful attack.

Each map has different BOSS for you to challenge.
